namingConventions.description: Database tables should use snake_case and be plural (e.g., `conflict_events`, `infrastructure_points`).
Python variables and function names should use snake_case (e.g., `event_count`, `calculate_intersection()`).
React component filenames should use kebab-case (e.g., `map-visualization.jsx`).
JavaScript variables and function names should use camelCase (e.g., `mapInstance`, `fetchEventData()`).
